      • addcandidate

        public void addcandidate(Candidate c,
                int[] ranklist)
        adding a candidate to finlist and meritlist( based on his ranks he can get into any of the merit lists )
        Parameters:
        c - Candidate to be added
        ranklist - Ranks of the candidate which will decide which meritlists it will go

      • rank

        public int rank(Candidate c,
       int cat,
       java.lang.Boolean pd)
        function to return rank of candidate given the category and PDstatus of meritlist
        Parameters:
        c - candidate whose rank to be found
        cat - category of merit list in which rank to be found
        pd - pd status of merit list in which rank to be found
        Returns:
        returns the rank of candidate in merit list

      • retmeritlist
